values.value: Inform customer batteries may initially draw from the grid during the day as they'll likely do a "balance" charge. This can be a bit scary as the daily consumption will go up. If it lasts more than 1 day get the installer back

Inform customer batteries may initially draw from the grid during the day as they'll likely do a "balance" charge. This can be a bit scary as the daily consumption will go up. If it lasts more than 1 day get the installer back
